name: Blower (neker)
description:
You come from a long lineage of Blowers. An odd folk known mostly for their occult flutes which allow them to communicate with the malignant spirits of the sea. Captain of the ship Myrant, hired you on such voyage, to protect him, his crew and everyone who would be foolish enough to venture towards the edge of the world. 

Used lovely assets from opengameart.org <3 

-  https://opengameart.org/content/60-terrible-character-portraits

- https://opengameart.org/content/ships-with-ripple-effect

Also used some sounds from the amazing GDC18 audio pack! 

- https://sonniss.com/gameaudiogdc18/
